Major_Arcs.title: Nan and Cal in Ghost Town
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Nan and Cal in 'Ghost Town', their initial interactions, conflicts arising from Nan's desires for a different life, and the looming development of an airport that threatens to destroy Ghost Town.

sub_scenes.title: Nan's Initial Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Introduces Nan's dissatisfaction with Ghost Town and her rejection of Cal's advances.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Rejection and the Ghost Town Mystery

sub_scenes.title: Cal's Departure and Airport Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Cal leaves Ghost Town, frustrated by Nan's rejection, while new characters arrive discussing plans for an airport.

narrative_arcs.title: Cal's Frustrated Departure from Ghost Town
Arrival at Merrick Gulch and the 'Ghost Town' Label

sub_scenes.title: Airport Plans and Nan's Distress
sub_scenes.description: The airport plans are revealed, and Nan overhears, reacting with shock and distress at the impending demolition of Ghost Town.

narrative_arcs.title: Airport Development Plans for the Ghost Town
Nan's Distress and Realization of Ghost Town's Demolition

sub_scenes.title: Nan's Apology and Airport Discussion
sub_scenes.description: Nan apologizes to Cal and attempts to rationalize the airport development from a practical perspective.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Apology and Practical View of the Airport

sub_scenes.title: Nan's Internal Reflection and Cal's Cynicism
sub_scenes.description: Nan reflects on her harsh reaction to Cal, while Cal expresses his cynical view of love and Ghost Town.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Reflection on Her Harsh Reaction to Cal
Cal's Cynical Monologue on Love and Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Practicality
sub_scenes.description: Rough men approach Nan, creating an uncomfortable situation, followed by a discussion about the airport's practical benefits.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Rough Men and Nan's Resistance

sub_scenes.title: Father's Dismissal and Daughter-Father Argument
sub_scenes.description: Nan expresses her frustrations about the airport to her father, leading to a dismissive response and a heated argument about helping with horses.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Airport Frustration and Father's Dismissiveness
Horses for Construction and Father-Daughter Argument

sub_scenes.title: Nan's Humiliation and Family Advice
sub_scenes.description: Nan feels humiliated and reflects on the day's events, receiving comfort and advice from her mother and the maid.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Humiliation and Reflection in Bed
Mother's Advice on Love and Childishness
Father's Pragmatic Advice to Focus on Cal
Maid's Reassurance of Cal's Love and Need for Patience

sub_scenes.title: Nan's Resolve and Pursuit of Cal
sub_scenes.description: Nan decides to understand Cal's true feelings and actively seeks him out.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Resolve to Know Cal's True Feelings

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Duties and Father-Daughter Deal Argument
sub_scenes.description: A ranch hand requests Nan's help, shifting focus to ranch duties, and Nan argues with her father about a deal.

narrative_arcs.title: Horses Arriving and Ranch Hand's Request for Help
Argument with Father About a Deal

Major_Arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Reconciliation and Snowstorm
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Nan and Cal's reconciliation and the onset of a severe snowstorm that threatens the community, shifting the narrative from personal conflicts to a community crisis.

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Confession and Departure for Work
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal have an emotional conversation where Nan expresses her feelings and Cal explains his actions before departing for work.

sub_scenes.title: Horse Stampede and Time Skip
sub_scenes.description: A horse stampede occurs, followed by a time skip highlighting Nan's loneliness during Cal's extended absence.

sub_scenes.title: Belated Confession and Reunion
sub_scenes.description: Cal returns and confesses his feelings to Nan, leading to a reunion.

sub_scenes.title: Understanding and Snow Report
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal discuss their relationship, followed by a report on the severe snow depth.

sub_scenes.title: Weather Concerns and Fodder Worries
sub_scenes.description: Characters express concern about the weather and the dwindling fodder supplies.

sub_scenes.title: Indoor Discussion and Narrative Interlude
sub_scenes.description: The group discusses the weather indoors, and a narrative text box emphasizes the relentless snowfall.

sub_scenes.title: Decision to Act and Post-Night Despair
sub_scenes.description: Cal decides to take action against the crisis, transitioning to a scene of post-night concern and despair.

sub_scenes.title: Hope from the Sky and Emotional Resolution
sub_scenes.description: The arrival of a plane with fodder brings hope, leading to an emotional resolution between Nan and Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Hope from the Sky: Arrival of the Plane

Major_Arcs.title: Chane Benson's Town Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chane Benson and the conflict surrounding his reputation and articles written about him in town, setting up a tense atmosphere and interpersonal conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: The Cowboy's Confrontation and Skeptical Reactions
sub_scenes.description: Chane Benson confronts a man in town, and bystanders react with skepticism and sarcasm towards his actions.

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Gun Obsession and Sally's Concern
sub_scenes.description: Sally expresses concern about Jeff's obsession with guns and confronts him about handling their father's gun.

sub_scenes.title: Reassurance and Introduction to Mr. Benson
sub_scenes.description: Sally pleads with Jeff, and Clyde reassures her. Sally then introduces Mr. Benson to another man.

sub_scenes.title: Ominous Advice and Public Discussion
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Benson gives ominous advice, and public discussion arises about Chane Benson and an article written about him.

narrative_arcs.title: Ominous Advice and Mention of Violence
Public Discussion about Chane Benson's Reputation and Article

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation in the Office and Escalating Threats
sub_scenes.description: Chane Benson confronts Clyde about the article in Clyde's office, leading to escalating threats and Sally's warnings.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Warning in the Office

sub_scenes.title: Clyde's Determination and Public Reaction
sub_scenes.description: Clyde remains determined to publish articles despite threats, and the public reacts to these articles.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Determination to Publish Articles Despite Threats
Public Reaction to Clyde's Articles and Jeff's Insight

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Invitation and Awkward Dinner
sub_scenes.description: The idea of inviting Chane Benson to dinner is proposed, leading to an awkward dinner scene.

narrative_arcs.title: Considering a Dinner Invitation for Chane Benson
Awkward Dinner and Jeff's Demonstration for Chane

Major_Arcs.title: Escalating Conflict and Resolution with Chane Benson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the escalating conflict involving Chane Benson, Sally, and Jeff, leading to a confrontation and eventual resolution of the tension surrounding Chane Benson's presence in town.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Conversation and Moonlit Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Dinner conversation continues, transitioning to a moonlit confrontation between Sally and Chane Benson.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Accusation and Chane's Evasive Response
Escalating Accusations and Threat of Violence

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Confrontation with Jeff and Outburst
sub_scenes.description: Sally confronts Jeff, expressing her anger and betrayal over his interaction with Chane.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Confrontation with Jeff about Betrayal
Sally's Outburst and Accusation of Manipulation

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Chane's Dominance Assertion
sub_scenes.description: The confrontation continues with misunderstandings and Chane Benson asserting his dominance.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Reaction and Realization of Danger
sub_scenes.description: Sally reacts emotionally to Chane's dominance, realizing the danger and becoming determined to act against him.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Danger and Urgent Action

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Pursuit and Townsmen's Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Jeff pursues Chane to save Clyde, while townsmen confront Chane.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with the Editor and Townsmen

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Confrontation and Flashback to Office Tension
sub_scenes.description: The confrontation escalates, intercut with a flashback to the tense atmosphere in the Clarion office.

narrative_arcs.title: Flashback to Clarion Office - The Ticking Clock
Flashback - Uncertainty and Fear Behind the Door

sub_scenes.title: Relief and Reflection on Journalism
sub_scenes.description: The confrontation resolves with relief and a reflection on courage and decency in journalism.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Family, Courage, and Decency in Journalism

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy and Steve - Ranch Conflict and Romance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Betsy and Steve's story, introducing ranch troubles, their initial meeting, developing romance, and confrontation with antagonists.

sub_scenes.title: Physical Threat and Introduction of Steve
sub_scenes.description: A physical threat is presented, followed by the introduction of Steve Daley at Betsy's ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Steve Daley to Betsy

sub_scenes.title: Confirmation of Hiring and Ranch Troubles
sub_scenes.description: Steve's hiring is confirmed, and the ranch's ongoing troubles are revealed.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation of Hiring and Foreshadowing Trouble
Discussion about Steve's Character and Past

sub_scenes.title: Journey to Town and Lingering Doubts
sub_scenes.description: Betsy and Steve journey to town, with Betsy still harboring doubts about Steve.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey to Town and Lingering Doubts

sub_scenes.title: Hank's Orders and Betsy's Questioning
sub_scenes.description: Hank gives orders, and Betsy questions the extent of Steve's role.

sub_scenes.title: Leaving Store and Betsy's Sarcasm
sub_scenes.description: Steve and Betsy leave the store, with Betsy displaying sarcasm.

narrative_arcs.title: Leaving the Store and Betsy's Sarcasm

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Fred Bridges and Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Betsy is confronted by Fred Bridges, leading to an intervention and physical altercation.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Gunfighters Discussion
sub_scenes.description: The aftermath of the fight is shown, and observers discuss gunfighters and Steve's abilities.

narrative_arcs.title: Aftermath of the Punch and Further Threat
Discussion on Gunfighters and Hornets' Nest

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Reflection and Orders to Hank
sub_scenes.description: Betsy reflects on Steve and orders Hank to fire him, then reconsiders.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy Reconsiders and Romantic Feelings
sub_scenes.description: Betsy changes her mind about firing Steve, acknowledging her romantic feelings.

sub_scenes.title: Hank Summons Steve and Betsy's Gratitude
sub_scenes.description: Hank summons Steve, and Betsy expresses her gratitude to Hank.

sub_scenes.title: Steve's Arrival and Betsy's Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: Steve arrives, and Betsy questions him about his profession.

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy and Steve - Romantic Resolution and Ranch Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes Betsy and Steve's romantic arc with a proposal while also addressing the ongoing ranch conflict and setting up a confrontation with Old Man Bridges.

sub_scenes.title: Profession Inquiry and Intensifying Emotions
sub_scenes.description: Betsy inquires about Steve's profession, leading to an intensification of emotions and Steve's confession.

sub_scenes.title: Conflict of Love and Profession and Steve's Decision
sub_scenes.description: A conflict arises between love and Steve's profession, leading to Steve's decision to give up his gun.

sub_scenes.title: Old Man Bridges' Complaint and Hank's Accusation
sub_scenes.description: Old Man Bridges complains about ranch troubles, and Hank accuses him of trespassing.

narrative_arcs.title: Old Man Bridges' Complaint and Hank's Accusation

sub_scenes.title: Betsy and Steve's Confrontation and Steve's Challenge
sub_scenes.description: Betsy confronts Steve about taking over the valley, and Steve challenges Hank.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy and Steve's Confrontation and Steve's Challenge to Hank

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Stand Against Guns and Concern
sub_scenes.description: Betsy declares her stance against gun violence and expresses concern for Steve.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Stand Against Gun Violence and Concern for Steve

sub_scenes.title: Steve's Reflection on Past and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Steve reflects on past mistakes and an ambush, adding depth to his character and motivations.

narrative_arcs.title: Steve's Reflection on Past Mistakes and the Ambush

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Emotional Resolve and Parting with Steve
sub_scenes.description: Betsy resolves to act, leading to a parting moment with Steve.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy and Steve's Parting and Betsy's Worried Reflection

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Command and Ride to Devil's Pass
sub_scenes.description: Betsy takes command and rides to Devil's Pass, anticipating conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Command and Ride to Devil's Pass

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Ominous Recognition
sub_scenes.description: Arrival at Devil's Pass sets an ominous tone, with historical context about Betsy's father.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Ominous Recognition

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Recovery and Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: Betsy recovers consciousness, reassured by Steve about the situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Recovery and Reassurance by Steve

sub_scenes.title: Affectionate Reunion and Future Outlook
sub_scenes.description: Betsy and Steve have an affectionate reunion, solidifying their commitment and future together.

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie, Fred, and Dave - Love Triangle and Contract Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Carrie's emotional journey involving Fred and Dave, centering around a love triangle and the resolution of the Carlton contract issue.

sub_scenes.title: Argument to Protect Dave and Range Conflict
sub_scenes.description: An argument to protect Dave initiates a new storyline, alongside the introduction of a range conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Curley's Troubled Arrival and Range Conflict

sub_scenes.title: Fence Explanation and Fred Gordon's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Explanation of the fence importance is given, followed by Fred Gordon's arrival and confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Explaining the Fence and Herd Concerns
Fred Gordon's Polite but Tense Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Tension and Gun Draw
sub_scenes.description: Tension escalates with a gun draw, hinting at imminent violence.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback Apology and Conflicted Feelings
sub_scenes.description: Flashbacks reveal past apologies and Carrie's conflicted feelings towards Fred and Dave.

narrative_arcs.title: Carrie and Dave's Conflicted Feelings about Fred

sub_scenes.title: Present Confrontation and Accusation
sub_scenes.description: Present confrontation between Carrie and Fred, leading to accusations and Dave's intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Present Confrontation: Fred Gordon and Carrie

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Confession and Dave's Reconciliation Attempt
sub_scenes.description: Carrie confesses her feelings, and Dave attempts reconciliation, followed by a romantic flashback.

narrative_arcs.title: Carrie's Confession and Dave's Attempt to Reconcile

sub_scenes.title: Fred's Contract-Driven Proposal and Carrie's Accusation
sub_scenes.description: Fred's true motivations are revealed, leading to Carrie's accusation of deceit.

sub_scenes.title: Dave's Interruption and Carrie's Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Dave interrupts, but Carrie rejects him, resolving to confront Mr. Carlton.

sub_scenes.title: Approaching Carlton's Office and Direct Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Carrie approaches Carlton's office, leading to a direct confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Carlton's Resolution and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Carlton resolves the contract issue in Carrie's favor, leading to the immediate aftermath and Fred's defeat.

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Reassurance and Father's Wisdom
sub_scenes.description: Carrie seeks emotional reassurance from her father, who offers wisdom about love and life.

narrative_arcs.title: Father's Wisdom on Love and Life

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Relief and Town Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Carrie expresses relief and encounters Dave in town, initiating a new conversation.

narrative_arcs.title: Carrie's Relief and Reflection on Fred

sub_scenes.title: Dave's Inquiry and Carrie's Declaration of Love
sub_scenes.description: Dave inquires about Fred, leading to Carrie's declaration of love for Fred.

sub_scenes.title: Affirmation, Departure, and Horseback Ride
sub_scenes.description: Carrie affirms her love and departs, leading to a horseback ride with Dave.

sub_scenes.title: Denial and Dave's Disbelief
sub_scenes.description: Carrie denies her feelings, but Dave expresses disbelief, sensing her true emotions.

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Concern and Carlton's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Carrie expresses concern to her father, followed by the unexpected arrival of Mr. Carlton.

narrative_arcs.title: Mr. Carlton's Arrival and Carrie's Misinterpretation

sub_scenes.title: Revelation of Fred's Sacrifice and Carrie's Ride
sub_scenes.description: Carlton reveals Fred's sacrifice, leading to Carrie's emotional awakening and ride to Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Revelation of Fred's Sacrifice and Brother's Intervention
Carrie's Emotional Awakening and Ride to Fred

sub_scenes.title: Reunion and Romantic Climax
sub_scenes.description: Carrie and Fred reunite, leading to a romantic climax and proposal.

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk and Rance - Law, Brotherhood, and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dirk and Rance's storyline, involving law enforcement, brotherly conflict, and ultimate resolution, culminating in Rance and Chris's marriage.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Return and Injury Revealed
sub_scenes.description: Dirk returns injured, and his sister reveals he has been shot.

sub_scenes.title: Dad's Concern and Marshal's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Dad expresses concern about Dirk's situation, and Marshal Rance Cready arrives at the ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Marshal Rance Cready's Arrival and Initial Inquiry

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit Confirmation and Denial
sub_scenes.description: Pursuit of Dirk is confirmed, and Dirk's sister denies his presence at the ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation of Pursuit and Denial of Dirk's Presence

sub_scenes.title: Marshal's Insistence and Proof
sub_scenes.description: The Marshal insists on searching, revealing proof of Dirk's presence.

narrative_arcs.title: Rance Cready's Insistence and Proof of Dirk's Presence

sub_scenes.title: Concern for Dirk and Assertion of Law
sub_scenes.description: Marshal finds Dirk injured and asserts the law, intending to take him into custody.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern for Injured Dirk and Assertion of Law

sub_scenes.title: Negotiated Delay and Introspection
sub_scenes.description: A delay is negotiated for Dirk's recovery, and Rance begins to introspect.

sub_scenes.title: Rejection of Excuse and Acknowledgment of Change
sub_scenes.description: Excuse is rejected, and acknowledgment of change in relationship is made.

narrative_arcs.title: Rejection of Excuse and Acknowledgment of Change

sub_scenes.title: Argument, Confession and Love Confirmation
sub_scenes.description: Argument leads to confession and confirmation of love between Chris and Rance.

narrative_arcs.title: Argument, Confession and Confirmation of Love

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Internal Conflict and Misjudgment
sub_scenes.description: Rance reflects on his misjudgment of Chris and their relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Rance's Internal Conflict and Realization of Misjudgment

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Situation and Chris's Suggestion
sub_scenes.description: Dirk's situation is discussed, and Chris proposes a plan for Dirk's escape.

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Decision, Departure, and Realization
sub_scenes.description: Rance decides on a course of action, realizing Chris's manipulation and his own priorities.

narrative_arcs.title: Rance's Decision, Departure Announcement and Realization of Manipulation

sub_scenes.title: Concern about Marshal and Realization of Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Concern about the Marshal arises, followed by the realization of pursuit.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern about the Marshal and Reassurance
Realization of Pursuit and Urgent Escape

sub_scenes.title: Narration of Failed Evasion and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Narration reveals failed evasion attempts, leading to a confrontation with the Marshal.

sub_scenes.title: Shooting, Rance's Reaction and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Shooting erupts, followed by Rance's angry reaction and the immediate aftermath of injury.

sub_scenes.title: Argument on Handling Injured and Forced Departure
sub_scenes.description: Argument about handling the injured person leads to a forced departure.

narrative_arcs.title: Argument on Handling the Injured Person
Forced Departure and Concern for the Injured

sub_scenes.title: Woman's Reflection and Return to Rance
sub_scenes.description: Chris reflects on her actions and feelings, deciding to return to Rance.

narrative_arcs.title: Woman's Reflection and Understanding of Love for Rance
Return to Rance and Confrontation about Injury

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Awakening and Mother's Relief
sub_scenes.description: Rance awakens, bringing relief to his mother and setting a positive tone for recovery.

sub_scenes.title: Clarification and Father's Impatience
sub_scenes.description: Clarification of events leads to the father's impatient announcement about the wedding.

narrative_arcs.title: Father's Departure and Hint at Private Matters

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Dramatic Entrance and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Dirk dramatically interrupts the wedding, causing confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Marshal's Arrival and Brother's Defense
sub_scenes.description: Marshal arrives, and Dirk's brother defends Dirk, resolving the tension.
